description: The software implements the methodology of cybersecurity training architecture and is leveraged to build a turn-key based simulated cyberattack game in which the player assumes the facility manager's role and must defend the OT network from adaptive cyberattacks by directly configuring the physical network environment and implementing security policies.
name: Network Defense Workforce Development System

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
